argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cardon | |- ( card ` A ) e. On |
| 2 |  | #P_cardon | |- ( card ` B ) e. On |
| 3 |  | #P_onacda | |- ( ( ( card ` A ) e. On /\ ( card ` B ) e. On ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( ( card ` A ) +c ( card ` B ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( ( card ` A ) +c ( card ` B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cardid2 | |- ( A e. dom card -> ( card ` A ) ~~ A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cardid2 | |- ( B e. dom card -> ( card ` B ) ~~ B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cdaen | |- ( ( ( card ` A ) ~~ A /\ ( card ` B ) ~~ B ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +c ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +c ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_entr | |- ( ( ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( ( card ` A ) +c ( card ` B ) ) /\ ( ( card ` A ) +c ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 8, 9 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A +c B ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ensymd | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( A +c B ) ~~ ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) |
